introduction.textMotivation: Hi! In this website you can see my profile professional. My biggest passion now is to program because I can build things awesome. I like learning new technologies because these have interesting things. Lately, I am interested in the competitive programming, as it is a way to learn and have fun.

work1.text: I graduated from school Alberto Lleras Camargo

work2.text: I went to study at the SENA: "System Technique"

work3.text: I graduated from SENA like "System Technique"

work5.text: I went to study at the Institude "Escala"

work6.text: I went to study at the National University of Colombia at Bogotá: "System and Computing Engineering".

text: I worked as a computer monitor in the subject: "Jose Celestino Mutis".

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.occupation: I am currently studying System and Computing Engineering

paragraph: The game was developed for the subject "Object Oriented Programming" taught by teacher "Jorge Enrique Amaya Cala" in the University National of Colombia.

items: Version en C: it's used utilizando Imperative programming. Interface was made in console.
Version en JavaScript: it's used "Object Oriented Programming for prototype". Interface was made in console.
Version en C++: it's used "Object Oriented Programming". Interface was made with the library SFML
Version en Java: it's used "Object Oriented Programming". Interface was made with the library JSFML

numericalMethods.title: Numerical Methods
paragraph: In this project is all the material and implementations of the main numerical methods proposed by Professor Edwin Camilo Cubides of the National University of Colombia.
The programming lenguage used is "SCILAB", as this is recommended for the applications with math.

translator.title: Translator of the programming language "Clojure" to "Python"
paragraph: This project was developed for the subject "programming languages" taught by teacher "Felipe Restrepo Calle" in the University National of Colombia.
The project aims to demonstrate that languages that make excessive use of parenthesis are impractical and difficult to read. Several algorithms are compared to visualize the big difference.
In the future it can serve as a source code migration tool

dataStructures.title: Implementation of Data Structures and Important Algorithms
paragraph: In this project are the majority of Data Structures and algorithms ordering and graphs
Also it is all the material of the teacher "Yoan José Pinzón Ardila" of the National University of colombia.

instructions.title: Instructions
paragraph: You have to choose a number from 1 to 10 and Go, that is the number of digits of your number that you want to guess.
After, You must write your number and then click on the buttom "Submit"
The numbers will not have leading zeros except the number zero.
You have only a number of attempts shown above.

digits.text: In the bottom, Your number will appear in the left and for each number will appear with the next meaning

form.paragraph: Want to get in touch with me? Fill out the form below to send me a message and I will try to get back to you within 24 hours!
